title: Gameplay Interactions
body:
You know how {{champion:498}} & {{champion:497}} can tp back together and how you can can catch an enemy Dravan's axes as Draven, right? Gameplay interactions like that and stuff.
Well what if {{champion:21}} could shoot ally {{champion:41}} barrels to trigger them and ricochet?  

http://i.imgur.com/BUAxDAC.png

There could be some cool pirate bot-lane synergy. That would be really cool.
What do you think? Too op?

tl;dr
What if MF could shoot Double Up on an ally GP Powder Keg to trigger the keg AND ricochet.

replies.body: Gankplank and MF they are couple. I think League rework them so they can partner up with each other{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}. And nice ass drawing lol!

It could create some cool off meta play.

Also, cheers on the booty.
